The present paper focuses mostly on US findings. The volume edited by Anthony Atkinson and Thomas Piketty (2006) gathers series for France, the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland, Germany, Switzerland, the Netherlands, and India. Since then, preliminary series have been produced for Sweden, Finland, Japan, and Spain.
